title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day
author: oeyoews
name: Tiddlywiki Special Day
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/readme","text":"* {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/icon}} Tiddlywiki Special Day !! NOTE * info/startup-timestamp 使用世界时间, 比我们慢了八小时 !! TODO * add some select option for some special festival * [[Source|https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw/tree/main/dev/plugins/tiddlywiki-special-day]] * [[Demo|https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw/main]] "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/actions/actions":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/actions/actions","tags":"$:/tags/StartupAction/PostRender","text":" \define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/config <$set name="date-pick" value={{{ [get[date-pick]else[1996]] }}} > <$list filter="[{$:/info/startup-timestamp}prefix]" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[happynewyear]random[1]] }}} /> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/config"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/date-pick-config":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/date-pick-config","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/config
date pick <$edit-text tiddler=<> field="date-pick" tag="input" placeholder="20230122" />
!! Info * startup-time: {{$:/info/startup-timestamp}} !! Test * {{$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/test}} <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> Reset Configuration "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023-1":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023-1","subtitle":"👋 Hi","tags":"happynewyear","mask-closable":"yes","text":"

🎉 Happy New Year 2023! 🐇

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023-2":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023-2","subtitle":"👋 Hi","tags":"happynewyear","mask-closable":"yes","text":"

对联

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023-00":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023-00","subtitle":"👋 Hi","tags":"happynewyear","mask-closable":"yes","text":"

🎉 Happy New Year 2023! 🐇(00)

"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/example":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/example"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/filter/random.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-random-tip/filter/random.js","module-type":"filteroperator","type":"application/javascript","text":"(function(){"use strict";exports.random=function(n,t,r){var e,o=[],a=[],i=parseInt(t.operand||"1");if(isNaN(i)){i=1}n(function(n,t){a.push(t)});while(i&&a.length){e=Math.floor(Math.random()*a.length);o.push(a[e]);a.splice(e,1);i--}return o}})(); "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/icon":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/icon","text":" "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/macro/happy-new-year":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/macro/happy-new-year","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define special-day(day:"20230122", tiddler:"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/docs/happy-new-year-2023") <$set name=oday value=$day$ > <$list filter="[{$:/info/startup-timestamp}prefix]" > {{$tiddler$}} \end "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/script":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/script","tags":"$:/tags/RawMarkupWikified/BottomBody"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/style/gray":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/style/gray","","text":"html { filter: progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.BasicImage(grayscale=0.85); -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%);} "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/style":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/style","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/test":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/test","text":"\define tid() $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/config <$button> test your config <$set name="date-pick" value={{{ [get[date-pick]else[1996]] }}} > <$list filter="[{$:/info/startup-timestamp}prefix]" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[happynewyear]random[1]] }}} /> "},"/home/runner/work/neotw/neotw/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/tiddlers/ui/ui.tid":{"title":"/home/runner/work/neotw/neotw/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-special-day/tiddlers/ui/ui.tid"}}}
